title: Mexican Talavera Ceramic Double Rocker Switch or Electrical Outlet Cover Plate. Designs and Colors Vary!
description: Beautiful handcrafted & hand painted Talavera pottery light and outlet switch cover plate. Fits any standard American double light switch opening. All of our Talavera is: - Handcrafted & hand painted by our family in Dolores Hidalgo, Guanajuato, Mexico. - Waterproof, Fade Resistant, Lead Free, Dishwasher & Microwave Safe - Made with 100% Natural Materials - Floral Patterns on some items may vary - Crafted with a hold in the back of the clay for hanging. - Although expertly packaged, ceramics are breakable with the right amount of force. Please keep in mind that our Prime items pass through the hands of multiple carriers before reaching you. Please contact us with any questions, concerns or requests for special orders. Â¡Gracias!
